mapper.select: select mq.mailQueueId, mq.title, mq.sender, mq.receiver, mq.content, mq.type, mq.status, mq.sendTime, mq.createTime, mq.updateTime from mail_queue mq where mailQueueId=#{mailQueueId}
mapper.update: update mail_queue set title=#{title}, sender=#{sender}, receiver=#{receiver}, content=#{content}, status=#{status}, sendTime=#{sendTime} where mailQueueId=#{mailQueueId}
mapper.select: select mq.mailQueueId, mq.title, mq.sender, mq.receiver, mq.content, mq.type, mq.status, mq.sendTime, mq.createTime, mq.updateTime from mail_queue mq where mq.status=${@com.ytoxl.module.uhome.uhomecontent.dataobject.MailQueue@STATUS_DEFAULT} and (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP between mq.sendTime and date_add(mq.sendTime, interval 12 HOUR)) order by mq.sendTime asc limit #{num}

select count(*) from mail_queue mq where mq.status=${@com.ytoxl.module.uhome.uhomecontent.dataobject.MailQueue@STATUS_DEFAULT} and (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP between mq.sendTime and date_add(mq.sendTime, interval 12 HOUR))
